verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> <S%G4490>expressly<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5306>later<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> shall fall away <S%G868>from<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, giving heed <S%G4337>to<s%> <S%G4108>seducing<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> of <S%G1140>demons<s%>,
through <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> of men that speak <S%G5573>lies<s%>, <S%G2743>branded<s%> in <S%G2398>their<s%> own <S%G4893>conscience<s%> as with a hot <S%G2743>iron<s%>;

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> to <S%G1060>marry<s%>, and commanding to abstain <S%G567>from<s%> <S%G1033>meats<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G3336>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> by them that <S%G4103>believe<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1921>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G2938>creature<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G2570>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> is to be <S%G579>rejected<s%>, if it be <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%>:

If thou <S%G5294>put<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> in mind <S%G5294>of<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, thou shalt <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, nourished <S%G1789>in<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> of the <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G1319>doctrine<s%> which thou <S%G3739>hast<s%> followed until <S%G3877>now<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G4984>bodily<s%> <S%G1129>exercise<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for a <S%G3641>little<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2150>godliness<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1860>promise<s%> of the <S%G2222>life<s%> which now <S%G3568>is<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of that which is to <S%G3195>come<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to this <S%G5124>end<s%> <S%G2872>we<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3679>strive<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2872>we<s%> have our <S%G1679>hope<s%> set <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4990>Saviour<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3122>specially<s%> of them that <S%G4103>believe<s%>.

Let <S%G2706><s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G2706>despise<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3503>youth<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> be <S%G1096>thou<s%> an <S%G5179>ensample<s%> to them that <S%G4103>believe<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G391>manner<s%> of <S%G1722>life<s%>, in <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G47>purity<s%>.
Till <S%G2193><s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%>, give <S%G4337>heed<s%> to <S%G320>reading<s%>, to <S%G3874>exhortation<s%>, to <S%G1319>teaching<s%>.

Neglect <S%G272><s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G5486>gift<s%> that is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G4671>thee<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> the laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of the <S%G4244>presbytery<s%>.

Be <S%G3191>diligent<s%> in these <S%G5023>things<s%>; give thyself <S%G2468>wholly<s%> <S%G1722>to<s%> <S%G5125>them<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4297>progress<s%> <S%G5600>may<s%> be <S%G5318>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>.

Take heed <S%G1907>to<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to thy <S%G1319>teaching<s%>. Continue <S%G1961>in<s%> these <S%G846>things<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> thou <S%G4982>shalt<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G4572>thyself<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> them that <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G4675>thee<s%>.
